title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: Rogers Communications, Jack Henry & Associates and Kansas City Southern - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 9/6/19, Rogers Communications Inc (Symbol: RCI), Jack Henry & Associates, Inc. (Symbol: JKHY), and Kansas City Southern (Symbol: KSU) will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends. Rogers Communications Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.50 on 10/1/19, Jack Henry & Associates, Inc. will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.40 on 9/30/19, and Kansas City Southern will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.36 on 10/2/19. As a percentage of RCI's recent stock price of $49.24, this dividend works out to approximately 1.02%, so look for shares of Rogers Communications Inc to trade 1.02% lower - all else being equal - when RCI shares open for trading on 9/6/19. Similarly, investors should look for JKHY to open 0.28% lower in price and for KSU to open 0.28% lower, all else being equal.
